name: Rathalos Blademaster

skills.name: Spirit Thrust
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. If the target is a Boss, this debuff cannot be resisted.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 3.2 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Spirit Step Slash (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Every second use of this skill in a Round will attack all enemies instead. Will also ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. If the target is a boss, will ignore 100% of the target’s DEF.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4 ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)

skills.name: Overhead Slash (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, places a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4.1 ATK

skills.name: Rathalos Mastery (Passive)
skills.description:
Inflicts 50% more damage against targets under [HP Burn] debuffs.
Receives 25% less damage from enemies under [HP Burn] debuffs.
Every fifth skill used by this Champion deals 200% more damage.
Note: To enable Rathalos Blademaster to quickly reach his 5th skill usage, pair him with champions who can provide him
Counter Attack
buff and
Ally Joint Attacks
. You can also equip him in Retaliation Set or have Retribution mastery to allow him to counter-attack enemies whenever he gets attacked! Relentless Set is a better alternative artifact that you can use to cycle his skills even faster compared to Retalation Set.
